Pre-Game Insights: South Africa are the only unbeaten side in the tournament
Pakistan have not been able to score enough runs and have not scored them very quickly
Pakistan have had the better of South Africa in T20s recently
South Africa's problem in scoring runs stops with Temba Bavuma, Pakistan's travels through their top-order
Miscellaneous Highlights: This match will be played on the same pitch as the Sri Lanka-New Zealand game, where Trent Boult took a career-best 4 for 13
Sydney is the only venue at the tournament where teams have breached 200
Others: Pakistan have a 3-0 win record against South Africa at the T20 World Cup, even though they last met in 2012
The average first innings score in Sydney at this tournament so far is 188
